name: 李明哲
objective:
本課程教授EXCEL及MATLAB，教學重心將著重於計算機程式於實務上之應用。

This course will lecture on the use of EXCEL and MATLAB, and the focus will be put on utilizing these tools to solve problems in the real world.
schedule:
Lec. #          Date            Contents
1               108/9/14        課程安排及EXCEL基本介紹
2               108/9/21        EXCEL 常用數學運算
3               108/9/28        EXCEL 條件統計分析
4               108/10/5        EXCEL 資料取得
5               108/10/12       EXCEL 時間與日期控制
6               108/10/19       EXCEL 字串資料操作
7               108/10/26       EXCEL 財務運算&大數據處理
8               108/11/2        EXCEL 樞紐分析
9               108/11/9        Mid-term Project Report (期中報告)
10              108/11/16       MATLAB basics
11              108/11/23       Advanced plotting and model building
12              108/11/30       Advanced plotting and model building
13              108/12/7        Linear algebraic equations
14              108/12/14       Linear algebraic equations 
15              108/12/21       Symbolic analysis
16              108/12/28       Symbolic analysis
17              109/1/4         Signal processing 
18              109/1/11        Final Project Report(期末報告)
scorePolicy:
上課表現 ─ 15%
小考與作業 ─ 30%
期中報告 ─ 25% 
期末報告 ─ 30%
materials:
參考書:
(1)不會就太可惜的EXCEL必學函數 第2版 (碁鋛出版社)
(2)超簡單的EXCEL樞紐分析 (旗標出版社)
(3)INTRODUCTION TO MATLAB 7 FOR ENGINEERS (by WILLIAM J. PALM III)
